results.name: Ternary Thue-Morse sequence: closed under a->abc, b->ac, c->b.
comment: First differences of A001969. Observed by Franklin T. Adams-Watters, proved by Max Alekseyev, Aug 30 2006
reference: M. Lothaire, Combinatorics on Words. Addison-Wesley, Reading, MA, 1983, p. 26.
link: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
formula: a(n) = A001969(n+1) - A001969(n). - _Franklin T. Adams-Watters_, Aug 28 2006
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
